[\[62a.7\]]dge ba gang zhe na/_des kun nas bslang [#]ba'i lus dang ngag gi las so/_/don dam par mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'khor ba thams cad do/_/skye bas 'thob [#]pas mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mi dge ba goms par byas pas de'i ngo bo'i [#]rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa ste/_des
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]mi dge ba nyid la 'dod pa [#]kun tu gnas pa'o/_/sbyor bas [#]mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la brten [#]pa dang /_dam pa'i chos ma yin pa nyan pa dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la brten nas/_lus kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_ngag
[\[62b.2\]]dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa spyod pa'o/_/mdun du bya bas [#]mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i ris [#]gang yang rung ba la brten pa mdun du byas nas/_'tshe ba sngon du btang ba'am/_lta ba ngan pa sngon du btang nas lha rten byed pa dang /_gang du skye bo phal po che bsod nams
[\[62b.3\]]ma yin pas sbyor ba der mchod pa'i las la sbyor ba'o/_/gnod par byed pas mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis log par spyod [#]pa'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pas mi dge ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus kyis nyes par
[\[62b.4\]]spyod pa spyad pa'am/_ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa [#]spyad pas ngan 'gro [#]'am bde 'gror 'bras bu mi 'dod pa 'phen pa'am/_yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'dzin pa'o/_/mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi dge ba gang zhe na/_gnyen po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin
[\[62b.5\]]pa dag go/_/bar du gcod pas mi dge ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i chos gang yin pa dag go/_/ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa yin/_lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir lung du ma bstan par brtag ce na/_ngo bo nyid dang /_'brel pa dang /_rjes su 'brel pa dang /_slong ba dang /_don dam pa
[\[62b.6\]]dang /_skye bas 'thob pa dang /_sbyor [#]ba dang /_mdun du bya ba [#]dang /_phan 'dogs [#]pa dang /_nye bar spyod [#]pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gnyen po dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_rgyu mthun [#]pas kyang lung du ma bstan par blta'o/_/khams brgyad dang /_skye mched brgyad dang /_phung po dang khams dang skye mched lhag ma rnams kyi phyogs [#]
[\[62b.7\]]gcig go/_/bdag la chos dang chos ma yin pa dang bral bar mngon par [#]zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ngo bo nyid kyis lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_khams dang skye mched gzugs can brgyad dang /_mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i yid dang /_srog gi dbang po dang /_ris mthun pa dang /_ming gi
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]tshogs dang /_tshig gi tshogs dang /_yi ge'i tshogs so/_/'brel pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_sdang ba yang ma yin/_dang ba yang ma yin pa'i sems su gyur pa'i ming dang tshig dang yi ge de dag nyid kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos
[\[63a.2\]]rnams so/_/rjes su 'brel pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_de dag nyid kyis [#]brjod pa'i bag chags so/_/slong bas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_de dag nyid kyis [#]yongs su zin pa'i sems dang [#]sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis gang kun nas bslang [#]ba'i lus dang ngag gi [#]las
[\[63a.3\]]so/_/don dam par lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_nam mkha' dang so sor brtags [#]pa ma yin pas [#]'gog pa'o/_/skye bas 'thob pa'i lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang /_dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/sbyor bas
[\[63a.4\]]lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin pa dang [#]/_dge ba yang ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas so/_/mdun du bya bas [#]lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i ris gang yang rung ba la brten pa mdun du byas nas/_'tshe ba'am lta
[\[63a.5\]]ba ngan pa rnam par spangs te/_lha rten byed pa dang /_gang du skye bo phal po che bsod nams kyang mi bskyed [#]la bsod nams ma yin pa'ang mi bskyed [#]par lha rten 'dzugs [#]pa'o/_/phan 'dogs pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bran dang /_gla mi dang /_las byed pa rnams dang /_
[\[63a.6\]]bu dang chung ma rnams la sdang [#]ba yang ma yin/_dang ba yang ma yin pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin pa'o/_/nye bar spyad pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_so sor brtags [#]pa ma yin pa[#]/_nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems kyis [#]longs spyod dmas [#]spyad pa'o/_/yongs su
[\[63a.7\]]'dzin pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bzo'i gnas la goms pa'i phyir [#]ma 'ongs pa na de'i ngo bo'i lus [#]yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ste/_de la [#]myur bar myur bar bzo'i gnas de dag la bslab pa [#]mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'o/_/gnyen pos lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]so sor ma brtags pas sman bsten [#]pa'o/_/nye bar zhi bas [#]lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa ste/_zhi gnas dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyu mthun pas lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/_sprul pa'i sems dang lhan cig skyes pa'o/_/
[\[63b.2\]]yang bstan pas kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan par blta [#]ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyis sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir ston pa ste/_de na de dag de bzhin du yongs su grub pa ni
[\[63b.3\]]gang yang med do/_/ji ltar na 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin/_'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan par brtag ce na/_'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ni 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan par blta'o/_/khams bzhi
[\[63b.4\]]dang /_skye mched gnyis dang /_de las gzhan pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi phyogs gcig [#]go/_/bdag 'dod pa la [#]'dod chags dang ma bral bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa yin/_gzugs dang rab
[\[63b.5\]]tu ldan pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir gzugs dang rab tu ldan par brtag ce na/_'dod pa la [#]'dod chags dang bral la/_gzugs la [#]'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa ni gzugs dang rab tu ldan par blta'o/_/khams bzhi dang skye mched gnyis ma
[\[63b.6\]]gtogs par de las gzhan pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag 'dod pa la [#]'dod chags dang bral bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin/_gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams ni
[\[63b.7\]]du zhig_/ci'i phyir gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan par brtag ce na/_gzugs la [#]'dod chags dang bral la/_gzugs med pa la [#]'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ni gzugs med pa dang [#]rab tu ldan par blta'o/_/phung po bzhi dang /_khams gsum dang
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]skye mched gnyis kyi [#]phyogs so/_/bdag gzugs la [#]'dod chags dang bral bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/'dod chags dang bral ba nyid kyang /_phyogs gcig las 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_mtha' dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid
[\[64a.2\]]dang /_rtogs pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_gnon pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_legs par bton [#]pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid du blta'o/_/yang 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid bcu ste/_rang bzhin gyis [#]'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_gnod
[\[64a.3\]]pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_nye bar brtan [#]pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_phul du byung bas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_rmongs pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_gnyen pos 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_yongs su shes pas 'dod
[\[64a.4\]]chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_spad [#]bas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_gong ma dang bcas pa'i [#]'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /_gong na med pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid do/_/rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
[\[64a.5\]]dang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i gnas kyi chos rnams la gang mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/gnod pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_'khrig pa la zhugs pa gdung ba dang bral nas gang mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/nye bar brtan [#]pas 'dod chags dang bral ba
[\[64a.6\]]nyid gang zhe na/_'drangs par zos pa zas zhim po la yang gang [#]mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/phul du byung bas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_thabs shin tu chen po thob pa[#]/_thabs dma' ba la gang mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/rmongs pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid
[\[64a.7\]]gang zhe na/_byis pa rnams mya ngan las 'das pa la [#]gang mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/gnyen pos 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ba gang yin pa'o/_/yongs su shes pas 'dod chags dang
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_mthong ba'i lam thob pa/_khams gsum pa la gang mi 'phrod par 'dzin pa nyid do/_/spong bas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_sa dang sar nyon mongs pa rab tu spong ba'i mi mthun par 'dzin pa nyid gang yin pa'o/_/[#]gong ma dang bcas pa'i 'dod
[\[64b.2\]]chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_'jig rten pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang yin pa'o/_/gong na med pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dod chags dang
[\[64b.3\]]bral ba nyid [#]gang yin pa ste/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na slob pa yin/_slob pa rnams ni du zhib/_/ci'i phyir slob par brtag [#]ce na/_thar pa la brtson pa'i dge ba ni slob par blta'o/_/phung po rnams dang /_
[\[64b.4\]]khams bcu dang /_skye mched bzhi'i phyogs so/_/bdag thar pa la brtson par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na mi slob pa [#]yin/_mi slob pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir mi slob par brtag ce na/_bslab pa mthar phyin pa'i dge ba ni mi slob par blta'o/_/
[\[64b.5\]]phung po rnams dang /_khams bcu dang /_skye mched bzhi'i phyogs so/_/bdag grol bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin/_slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams ni [#]du zhig_/ci'i phyir slob pa
[\[64b.6\]]yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin par brtag ce na/_so so'i skye bo'i dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang /_slob pa'i nyon mongs pa can dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang /_mi slob pa'i lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'dus ma byas ni slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma
[\[64b.7\]]yin par blta'o/_/khams brgyad dang /_skye mched brgyad dang /_de las gzhan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi phyogs gcig go[#]/_/bdag grol ba ma yin par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na mthong bas spang bar [#]bya ba yin/_mthong bas spang bar bya ba
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir mthong bas spang bar bya bar [#]brtag ce na/_nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba kun tu brtags pa rnams dang /_the tshom dang lta ba'i gnas dang lta ba la log par zhugs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa dag dang /_gang
[\[65a.2\]]yang lta bas kun nas bslang ba'i lus kyi [#]las dang /_ngag gi [#]las dang /_ngan song ba'i [#]phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched thams cad ni mthong bas spang bar bya bar blta'o/_/thams cad kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag mthong ba phun sum tshogs par [#]mngon par zhen pa
[\[65a.3\]]spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na bsgom [#]pas spang bar bya ba yin/_bsgom [#]pas spang bar bya ba rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir bsgom [#]pas spang bar bya bar [#]brtag ce na/_mthong ba'i lam thob pa [#]de yan chad kyi mthong bas spang bar bya ba las bzlog pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams
[\[65a.4\]]so/_/thams cad kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag sgom [#]pa phun sum tshogs par [#]mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na spang bar bya ba ma yin/_spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin par brtag ce na/_zag pa med pa ni spang bar
[\[65a.5\]]bya ba ma yin par blta'o/_/des par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs par phung po rnams dang /_khams gsum [#]dang /_skye mched gnyis kyi [#]phyogs so/_/bdag grub par mngon par zhen pa spang pa'i [#]phyir ro/_/ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin/_rten cing
[\[65a.6\]]'brel par 'byung ba rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar [#]brtag ce na/_mtshan nyid dang /_yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang /_yan lag mdor bsdu ba dang /_yan lag rkyen nyid du rnam par gzhag pa dang /_yan lag gi las rnam par gzhag pa dang /_yan
[\[65a.7\]]lag kun nas nyon mongs par bsdu ba dang /_don dang /_zab pa dang /_rab tu dbye ba dang /_lugs dang mthun pa dang /_/lugs dang mi mthun pas kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar blta'o/_/chos kyi khams dang /_chos kyi [#]skye mched kyi phyogs gcig ma gtogs pa [#]thams cad do/_
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bdag dang chos [#]rgyu med pa dang mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/mtshan nyid kyis [#]ji lta bu zhe na/_g.yo ba med pa'i rkyen las byung ba dang /_mi rtag pa'i rkyen las byung ba dang /_nus pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/yan lag rnam par dbye bas
[\[65b.2\]]ji lta bu zhe na/_yan lag bcu gnyis rnams te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ni/_ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_/len pa dang /_
[\[65b.3\]]srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'o/_/yan lag mdor bsdu bas [#]ji ltar bu zhe na/_'phen pa'i yan lag dang /_'phangs pa'i yan lag dang /_mngon par 'grub [#]par byed pa'i yan lag dang /_mngon par grub pa'i yan lag go/_/'phen pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_ma rig
[\[65b.4\]]pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/'phangs pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba'o/_/mngon par 'grub [#]par byed pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa'o/_/mngon par grub
[\[65b.5\]]pa'i yan lag gang zhe na/_skye ba dang /_rga shi'o/_/yan lag rkyen nyid du rnam par bzhag pas ji lta bu zhe na/_bag chags dang /_shugs dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_lhan cig 'byung bas kyang yan lag rnams rkyen nyid du rnam par gzhag par [#]rig par bya ste/_de yang ci
[\[65b.6\]]rigs su sbyar ro/_/yan lag gi las rnam par gzhag pas ji lta bu zhe na/_ma rig pa [#]ci'i las can zhe na/_srid pa la sems can rnams rmongs par byed pa dang /_'du byed rnams kyi rkyen kyang yin no/_/'du byed [#]ci'i las can zhe na/_'gro ba rnams su sems can dag
[\[65b.7\]]rnam par 'byed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bag chags kyi rkyen kyang yin no/_/rnam par shes pa ci'i las can zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'ching ba 'dzin pa dang /_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen kyang yin no/_/ming dang gzugs ci'i las can zhe na/_sems can rnams
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]lus len du 'jug pa dang /_skye mched drug gi rkyen kyang yin no/_/skye mched drug ci'i las can zhe na/_sems can rnams lus yongs su rdzogs par len du 'jug pa dang /_reg pa'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/reg pa ci'i las can zhe na/_yul gyi longs
[\[66a.2\]]spyod la sems can rnams 'dzud pa dang /_tshor ba'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/tshor ba ci'i las can zhe na/_skye ba'i [#]longs spyod la sems can rnams 'dzud pa dang /_sred pa'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/sred pa ci'i las can zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi skye ba 'dren pa dang /_len pa'i
[\[66a.3\]]rkyen kyang yin no/_/len pa ci'i las can zhe na/_yang srid pa len pa'i phyir sems can rnams kyi rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa dang bcas par byed pa dang /_srid pa'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/srid pa ci'i las can zhe na/_yang srid par sems can rnams mngon du phyogs par
[\[66a.4\]]byed pa dang /_skye ba'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/skye ba ci'i las can zhe na/_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_rig pa dang /_tshor ba'i rim gyis sems can rnams mngon par 'grub par byed pa dang /_rga shi'i rkyen kyang yin no/_/rga shi ci'i [#]las can zhe na/_
[\[66a.5\]]yang dang yang na tshod 'gyur ba dang /_srog 'gyur ba la sems can rnams sbyor ba'o/_/yan lag kun nas nyon mongs par bsdu bas [#]ji lta bu zhe na/_ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /_sred pa gang yin pa dang /_len pa gang yin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs
[\[66a.6\]]par bsdu'o/_/'du byed gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_srid pa gang yin pa 'di ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs par bsdu'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni tshe'i kun nas nyon mongs par bsdu'o/_/don gyis [#]ji lta bu zhe na/_byed pa po med pa'i don ni rten cing 'brel
[\[66a.7\]]par 'byung ba'i don dang /_rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i don dang /_sems can med pa'i don dang /_gzhan gyi dbang gi don dang /_g.yo ba med pa'i don dang /_mi rtag pa'i don dang /_skad cig pa'i don dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu [#]rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bur
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]#]mthun pa'i don dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi [#]don dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu so sor nges pa'i don [#]ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to/_/zab pas ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyus zab pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyis zab pa dang /_skye bas zab pa dang /_gnas pas zab pa dang /_'byung
[\[66b.2\]]bas zab pas [#]kyang zab par blta'o/_/yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skad cig pa yang yin la/_gnas par yang dmigs/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba g.yo ba med pa'i rkyen las 'byung ba'ang [#]yin la/_nus pa'i rkyen las 'byung bar [#]yang dmigs/_rten cing 'brel par
[\[66b.3\]]'byung ba sems can med pa yang yin la sems can du yang dmigs/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba byed pa po yang med la/_las dang 'bras bu chud mi za bar yang dmigs shing bdag las ma yin gzhan las ma yin gnyi ga las ma yin/_rang gi byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi
[\[66b.4\]]byed pa dang /_rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir zab pa'o/_/rab tu dbye bas ji lta bu zhe na/_rnam par shes pa 'byung ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_phyi'i lo tog 'byung ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_'jig pa dang chags [#]pa'i rab tu
[\[66b.5\]]dbye ba dang /_zas kyis brtan pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i 'gro ba [#]rnam par 'byed pa'i [#]rab tu dbye ba dang /_rnam par dag pa'i rab tu dbye ba dang /_mthu stobs kyi rab tu dbye bas kyang rab tu dbye bar blta'o/_/lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun
[\[66b.6\]]pas ji lta bu zhe na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pas kyang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa [#]bstan par blta'o/_/ji
[\[66b.7\]]ltar na rkyen yin/_rkyen rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir rkyen du brtag ce na/_rgyu dang de ma thag pa dang /_dmigs pa dang bdag pos kyang rkyen du blta'o/_/thams cad kyang rkyen du blta'o[#]/_/chos bdag gi rgyu las byung bar [#]mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyu'i rkyen gang zhe na
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang dge ba'i bag chags so/_/yang ngo bo nyid dang /_rab tu dbye ba dang /_grogs [#]dang /_mthun par rtogs pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bar du gcod pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pas kyang rgyu'i rkyen du blta'o/_/ngo bo nyid kyis ji
[\[67a.2\]]lta bu zhe na/_byed rgyu ste rgyu'i ngo bo nyid do/_/rab tu dbye bas ji lta bu zhe na/_'byung ba'i byed rgyu ni/_dper na rnam par shes pa'i ni rnam par shes pa'i [#]tshogs pa lta bu'o/_/gnas pa'i byed rgyu ni dper na sems can byung ba rnams dang 'byung bar 'dod pa [#]rnams kyi zas [#]lta bu'o/_/rten
[\[67a.3\]]pa'i byed rgyu ni dper na sems can rnams kyis lta bu'o/_/gsal ba'i byed rgyu ni/_dper na gzugs rnams kyi sgron ma lta bu'o/_/'gyur ba'i byed rgyu ni/_dper na shing gi me lta bu'o/_/'bral ba'i byed rgyu ni/_dper na rnga bar byed pa'i zor [#]ba lta bu'o/_/bsgyur ba'i byed rgyu ni/_
[\[67a.4\]]dper na gser la sogs pa'i bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/yid ches pa'i byed rgyu ni/_dper na me'i du ba lta bu'o/_/yid ches par byed pa'i byed [#]rgyu ni/_dper na bsgrub pa'i dam bca' ba dang /_gtan tshigs [#]dang dpe rnams lta bu'o/_/'thob pa'i byed rgyu ni/_dper
[\[67a.5\]]na mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam lta bu'o/_/tha snyad kyi byed rgyu ni/_dper na ming dang mtshan ma dang [#]/_mthong ba lta bu'o/_/ltos pa'i byed rgyu ni/_gang la ltos nas gang don du gnyer ba 'byung ba ste/_dper na bkres pa la ltos nas zas lta bu'o/_/'phen pa'i byed rgyu ni/_rgyang ring
[\[67a.6\]]po'i rkyen te/_dper na rga shi'i ma rig pa lta bu'o/_/mngon par 'grub pa'i byed rgyu ni nye ba'i [#]rkyen te/_dper na 'du byed rnams kyi ma rig pa lta bu'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa'i byed rgyu ni de las gzhan pa'i rkyen te/_dper na lo tog 'byung ba'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa
[\[67a.7\]]lta bu'o/_/chud par byed pa'i byed [#]rgyu ni mthun pa'i rkyen te/_dper na rgyal po mnyes par bya ba'i phyir [#]rgyal po la legs par brten [#]pa lta bu'o/_/so sor nges pa'i byed rgyu ni rkyen sna tshogs pa ste[#]/_dper na 'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'gro ba lnga'i rkyen lta bu'o/_/lhan cig byed pa'i
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]byed [#]rgyu ni rkyen rnams [#]tshogs pa ste/_dper na rnam par shes pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa dang /_yul yang snang ba dang /_de skyed pa'i [#]yid la byed pa yang nye bar gnas pa lta bu'o/_/mi mthun pa'i byed rgyu ni bar chad byed pa ste/_dper na lo tog la ser ba lta bu'o/_/mi mthun
[\[67b.2\]]pa ma yin pa'i byed rgyu ni bar chad mi byed pa ste/_dper na bar chad byed pa de nyid med pa lta bu'o/_/grogs kyis [#]ji lta bu zhe na/_chos gang dag grogs yod na 'byung gi gang yang rung ba ma tshang na [#]ma yin pa ste/_'di lta ste/_'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'o/_/
[\[67b.3\]]mthun par rtogs pas ji lta bu zhe na/_chos gang dag lhan cig 'byung bas dmigs pa mthun par rtogs kyi/_gang yang rung ba ma tshang na [#]ma yin pa ste/_'di lta ste/_sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so/_/rgyas pas ji lta bu zhe na/_sngon dge ba dang mi dge ba dang
[\[67b.4\]]lung du ma bstan pa'i chos bsgoms pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar gong nas gong du shin tu rgyas pa dang /_mchog tu rgyas par 'byung ba gang yin pa'o/_/bar du gcod pas ji lta bu zhe na/_gang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud thag bsring ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba'i rgyun rgyas
[\[67b.5\]]par brtan par byed pa'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pas ji lta bu zhe na/_lus yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir mi dge ba dang /_dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so/_/de ma thag pas ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyun mi 'chad par bar chad med pa dang /_mthun pa dang mi mthun pa la [#]sems
[\[67b.6\]]dang sems las byung ba 'byung [#]ba'i de ma thag pas [#]kyang de ma thag pa'i rkyen du blta'o[#]/_/dmigs pas ji lta bu zhe na/_yul yongs su chad pa'i dmigs pa dang /_yul yongs su ma chad pa'i dmigs pa dang /_yul la bkra bar 'dzin pa med pa'i dmigs pa dang /_yul
[\[67b.7\]]la bkra bar 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa dang /_dngos po dang bcas pa'i yul gyi dmigs pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i yul gyi dmigs pa dang /_dngos po'i dmigs pa dang /_kun brtags [#]pa'i dmigs pa dang /_phyin ci log gi dmigs pa dang /_phyin ci ma log [#]pa'i dmigs
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa dang /_thogs pa dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i dmigs pas kyang dmigs pa'i rkyen du blta'o/_/bdag pos ji lta bu zhe na/_rten la dbang byed pa dang /_'phen pa la dbang byed pa dang /_lhan cig 'byung ba la dbang byed pa dang /_
[\[68a.2\]]yul la dbang byed pa dang [#]/_skye bar dbang byed pa dang /_gnas par dbang byed pa [#]dang /_'bras bu la nye bar spyod [#]par dbang byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa la dbang byed pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa la dbang byed pas kyang bdag po'i rkyen du
[\[68a.3\]]blta'o/_/ji ltar na bsten pa mtshungs pa dang de dang mtshungs pa yin/_bsten pa mtshungs pa dang de dang mtshungs pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir bsten pa mtshungs pa dang de dang mtshungs par brtag ce na/_rnam par shes pa dang ma bral zhing de dang 'dra ba'i dbang po yul la rgyun
[\[68a.4\]]tu 'byung ba dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing rang dang 'dra ba rgyun tu 'byung bas kyang bsten pa mtshungs pa [#]dang de dang mtshungs par blta'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_gzugs can gyi khams dang skye mched lnga'o/_/bdag rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa dang
[\[68a.5\]]me ldan par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na zin pa yin/_zin pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir zin par brtag ce na/_tshor ba 'byung ba'i gnas kyi [#]gzugs ni zin par blta'o/_/gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gzugs
[\[68a.6\]]can lnga dang bzhi'i phyogs gcig go/_/bdag lus la dbang bsgyur [#]bar mngon par [#]zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na dbang po yin/_dbang po rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir dbang por brtag ce na/_yul la [#]'dzin par dbang byed pa dang /_rigs kyi rgyud la dbang byed pa dang /_
[\[68a.7\]]ris mthun par gnas par dbang byed pa dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi [#]'bras bu la nye bar spyod par dbang byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid la dbang byed pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid la dbang byed pas kyang dbang por
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]blta'o/_/tshor ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /_gzugs dang 'du byed kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_khams bcu gnyis dang /_skye mched drug dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_skye mched kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag dbang byed par mngon par zhen
[\[68b.2\]]pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid yin/_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid du brtag ce na/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[68b.3\]]chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis kyang sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid du blta'o/_/thams cad kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag sdug bsngal bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid yin/_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal [#]rnams ni du zhig_/
[\[68b.4\]]ci'i phyir 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid du brtag ce na/_bde ba'i tshor ba 'gyur ba rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos 'gyur ba rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_de la yang rjes su chags pas sems 'gyur bas kyang 'gyur ba'i [#]sdug bsngal nyid du blta'o/_/thams
[\[68b.5\]]cad kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag bde bar mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid yin/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid [#]rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du brtag ce na/_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin
[\[68b.6\]]pa'i tshor ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_de gnyi ga'i gnas ngan len [#]yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_de [#]gnyi ga las ma thar ba mi rtag pa nyid kyis rjes su bcings pas grub pa dang /_bde ba [#]
[\[68b.7\]]ma yin pas kyang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid du blta'o/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams gsum dang /_skye mched gnyis kyi phyogs gcig ma gtogs par thams cad do/_/bdag sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na rnam
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]par smin pa dang bcas pa yin/_rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir rnam par smin pa dang bcas par brtag ce na/_mi dge ba dang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas par blta'o/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams bcu
[\[69a.2\]]dang /_skye mched bzhi'i phyogs gcig go/_/bdag phung po 'jog par byed pa dang /_nying mtshams sbyor bar byed par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/rnam par smin pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas par blta'o/_/de las gzhan pa dag ni
[\[69a.3\]]rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o/_/ji ltar na zas yin/_zas rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir zas su brtag ce na/_'ju bas kyang 'ju ba las gyur pa dang /_yul gyis kyang yul las gyur pa dang /_re bas kyang re ba las gyur pa dang /_len pas kyang len pa las gyur pa nyid ni [#]
[\[69a.4\]]zas su blta'o/_/phung po gsum dang /_khams bcu gcig dang /_skye mched lnga'i phyogs gcig go/_/bdag zas kyis gnas par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/yang zas ni ma dag pa'i lus gnas par byed pa dang /_ma [#]dag pa dang dag pa'i lus gnas par byed pa dang /_dag pa'i lus
[\[69a.5\]]gnas par byed pa dang /_gnas par kun tu ston par [#]yang blta'o/_/ji ltar na gong ma dang bcas pa yin/_gong ma dang bcas pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir gong ma dang bcas par brtag ce na/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi phyogs gcig gis kyang gong ma dang bcas par blta'o/_/chos kyi
[\[69a.6\]]khams dang skye mched kyi phyogs gcig ma gtogs par thams cad do/_/bdag rdzas ngan par mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar na gong na med pa yin/_gong na med pa rnams ni du zhig_/ci'i phyir gong na med par brtag ce na/_'dus ma byas kyi phyogs gcig ni gong na
[\[69a.7\]]med par blta'o/_/chos kyi khams dang skye mched kyi phyogs gcig go/_/bdag rdzas kyi mchog tu mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na tshul 'dis rab tu dbye ba'i tshul tshad med do/_/yang mdor bsdu na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba ni
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]rnam pa gsum ste/_kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /_rnam par brtags [#]pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /_chos nyid [#]kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba'o/_/de la kun [#]brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po khams dang /_
[\[69b.2\]]skye mched rnams la bdag ce'am/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu zhes gang kun tu rtog pa'o/_/rnam par brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po [#]dang khams dang /_
[\[69b.3\]]skye mched de dag nyid do/_/chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched de dag nyid la bdag med cing /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu med
[\[69b.4\]]la/_bdag med pa ni yod pa nyid do/_/yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa bzhi ste/_mtshan nyid kyis [#]rab tu dbye ba dang /_rnam pas rab tu dbye ba dang /_lus kyis [#]rab tu dbye ba dang /_rgyun gyis rab tu dbye ba'o/_/mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams
[\[69b.5\]]dang /_skye mched rnams so so'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba'o/_/rnam pas rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched de dag nyid kyi rdzas su yod pa dang /_btags pa'i yod pa dang /_kun rdzob tu yod pa dang /_don dam par yod pa dang /_
[\[69b.6\]]gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_bstan du yod pa dang /_bstan du med pa dang /_de la sogs pa'i [#]ji skad bstan pa rnams so/_/lus kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_sems can rnams kyi lus ji snyed par phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched
[\[69b.7\]]rnams kyang de snyed do/_/rgyun gyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi skad cig re re [#]'byung ba'o/_/mtshan nyid kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas ci zhig yongs su shes she [#]na/_bdag la mngon par zhen pa yongs su shes so/_/rnam pas
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas ci zhig yongs su shes she na/_ril po'i 'du shes yongs su shes so/_/lus kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas [#]ci zhig yongs su shes she na/_ma byas pa dang phrad pa dang /_byas pa chud [#]za ba'i 'du shes yongs su shes so/_
[\[70a.2\]]rgyun gyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas ci zhig yongs su shes she na/_brtan [#]pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes so/_/yang phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'di dag nyid kyi [#]rab tu dbye ba rnam pa drug ste/_phyi rol tu bltas pas rab tu dbye ba dang /_nang du bltas pas rab tu
[\[70a.3\]]dbye ba dang /_rgyun ring ba'i dus kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /_dus yongs su chad pas rab tu dbye ba dang /_de'i dus kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /_kun tu ston [#]pas rab tu dbye ba'o/_/phyi rol tu bltas pas rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_phal cher 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pas rab tu dbye
[\[70a.4\]]ba'o/_/nang du bltas pas rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa thams cad do/_/rgyun ring ba'i dus kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_so so'i skye bo rnams kyi'o/_/dus yongs su chad pas rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyi [#]tha ma'i phung
[\[70a.5\]]po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams ma gtogs pa'o/_/de'i dus kyis rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_mi slob pa rnams kyi tha ma'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams so/_/kun tu ston pas rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[70a.6\]]dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa [#]rnams kyi [#]phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag kun tu ston pa'o/_/bsdus pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa bcu gcig tu blta ste/_mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa dang /_khams kyis bsdus pa dang /_rigs kyis bsdus pa dang /_gnas skabs kyis bsdus pa
[\[70a.7\]]dang /_grogs kyis bsdus pa dang /_phyogs kyis bsdus pa dang /_dus kyis bsdus pa dang /_phyogs gcig gis bsdus pa dang /_mtha' dag gis bsdus pa dang /_gcig gis gcig bsdus pa dang /_don dam pas bsdus pa'o/_/mtshan nyid kyis bsdus pa
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi so so'i [#]rang gi mtshan nyid gang [#]yin pa dag nyid kyis de dag bsdus par blta'o/_/khams kyis bsdus pa [#]gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi [#]sa bon kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de/_de [#]dag
[\[70b.2\]]gi khams bsdus pa'o/_/rigs kyis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams mtshan nyid tha dad kyang phung po'i don [(]brtsan [,]brtsam [)]par byas shing khams dang skye mched kyi don [(]brtsan [,]brtsam [)]par byas nas thams cad phan tshun gyis bsdus pa dag go/_/gnas skabs kyis
[\[70b.3\]]bsdus pa gang zhe na/_bde ba'i gnas skabs kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ni de dag nyid kyis bsdus pa'o/_/de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi gnas skabs dang /_sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i gnas skabs kyang de dag nyid [#]kyis bsdus pa'o/_/
[\[70b.4\]]grogs kyis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi phung po 'khor dang bcas pa ni de las gzhan pa'i phung po'i [#]grogs su gyur pa rnams kyis grogs kyi bsdu bas [#]bsdus pa'o/_/de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams la yang rig par bya'o/_/
[\[70b.5\]]phyogs kyis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_shar phyogs kyi phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched [#]gang yin pa de rnams de dag nyid kyis bsdus pa'o/_/de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i phyogs rnams la yang rig par bya'o/_/dus kyis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_'das pa'i phung po dang khams
[\[70b.6\]]dang /_skye mched rnams ni de dag [#]nyid kyis bsdus pa'o/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyang de dag nyid kyis bsdus pa'o/_/phyogs gcig gis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyis bsdus pa'i chos ji snyed pa de dag
[\[70b.7\]]gang yang rung bas bsdus pa ni phyogs gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o/_/mtha' dag gis bsdus pa gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyis bsdus pa'i chos ji snyed pa de dag [#]ma lus par [#]bsdus pa ni mtha' dag gis bsdus par rig par bya'o/_/gcig
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gis gcig bsdus pa gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi phung po khams du dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_khams bcu dang /_skye mched bcu dang /_khams dang skye mched gcig gi [#]phyogs gcig gis kyang [#]bsdus so/_/tshor ba'i phung po khams du dang skye mched du
[\[71a.2\]]dag gis bsdus she na/_khams dang skye mched gcig gi phyogs gcig gis bsdus so/_/tshor ba'i phung po ji lta bar 'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po'ang de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i phung po khams du [#]dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_khams bdun
[\[71a.3\]]dang skye mched gcig gis bsdus so[#]/_/mig gi [#]khams phung po du dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_skye mched gcig gis so/_/mig gi khams ji lta bar rna ba'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_
[\[71a.4\]]lus kyi khams kyang de bzhin no/_/gzugs kyi khams phung po du dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_skye mched gcig gis so/_/gzugs kyi khams ji lta bar [#]sgra'i khams dang dri'i khams dang ro'i khams dang /_reg bya'i
[\[71a.5\]]khams kyang de bzhin no/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams phung po du dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang /_yid kyi skye mched kyi phyogs gcig gis so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji lta bar rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus
[\[71a.6\]]dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no/_/chos kyi khams phung po du dang skye mched du dag gis bsdus she na/_phung po gsum dang /_gcig gi phyogs gcig dang /[ #]skye mched gcig gis bsdus so[#]/_/mig gi skye mched phung po du dang khams du dag
[\[71a.7\]]gis bsdus she na/_gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig dang /_khams gcig gis bsdus so/_/mig gi skye mched ji lta bar rna ba dang /_sna dang lce dang /_lus kyi skye mched rnams dang /_gzugs dang sgra dang /_dri dang ro dang /_reg bya'i skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]yid kyi skye mched phung po du dang khams du dag gis bsdus she na/_phung po gcig dang khams bdun gyis so/_/chos kyi skye mched phung po du dang khams du dag gis bsdus she na/_phung po gsum dang gcig gi phyogs gcig dang /_khams gcig gis bsdus so/_/
[\[71b.2\]]de bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i chos [#]phung po bstan pa dang [#]/_khams dang skye mched bstan pa gang yin pa de [#]dag dang gang dag de bzhin du ma bstan pa [#]'di lta ste/_rdzas su yod pa dang /_btags pa'i [#]yod pa dang /_kun rdzob tu yod pa dang /_don dam par yod pa dang /_
[\[71b.3\]]shes par bya ba dang /_rnam par shes par bya ba dang /_mngon par shes par bya ba dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_bstan du yod pa dang /_bstan du med pa la sogs pa de dag kyang phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyis bsdus par
[\[71b.4\]]ji ltar mthun mthun du rig par bya ste/_de ni sngar bstan pa nyid do/_/don dam pas [#]bsdus pa gang zhe na/_gang phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/de ltar bsdus pa la mkhas pas phan yon ci zhig 'thob ce na/_dmigs pa [#]mngon par sdud [#]pa'i
[\[71b.5\]]phan yon 'thob ste/_ji lta ji ltar dmigs pa mngon par sdud pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel lo/_/mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa drug tu [#]blta ste/_tha dad pa med pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_'dres par gyur pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_
[\[71b.6\]]phrad pas [#]mtshungs par [#]ldan pa dang /_lhan cig 'byung bas mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_bya ba bsgrubs [#]pas mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_mthun par rtogs pas mtshungs par ldan pa'o/_/tha dad pa med pas [#]mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_rdul phra rab kyi phyogs la phyogs can
[\[71b.7\]]thams cad tha dad pa med pa'o/_/'dres par gyur pas mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_rdul phra rab las gong ma phyogs can rnams 'dres par gyur pa'o[#]/_/phrad pas mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_phyogs can 'dus pa rnams nyid phan tshun phrad pa'o/_/lhan cig 'byung bas mtshungs
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]par ldan pa gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched gang yin pa dag lhan cig 'byung bas 'khod pa ste/_skye ba gcig pa dang /_gnas pa'i ngang gcig pa dang /_'gag pa gcig pa rnams so/_/bya ba bsgrubs pas [#]mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/
[\[72a.2\]]'di lta ste/_dge slong gnyis rtsod pa gang yang rung ba la [#]mtshungs par zhugs pa lta bu'o/_/mthun par rtogs pas mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dmigs pa gcig la [#]mthun par rtogs pa'o/_/mthun par rtogs pas
[\[72a.3\]]mtshungs par ldan pa de yang gzhan gyi dngos pos [#]yin gyi bdag gi dngos pos ni [#]ma yin no/_/mthun pa gnyis yin gyi mi mthun pa gnyis ni ma yin no/_/dus 'dra ba gnyis yin gyi dus mi 'dra ba gnyis ni ma yin no/_/mthun pa'i khams dang /_sa pa gnyis yin gyi [#]
[\[72a.4\]]mi mthun pa'i khams dang /_sa pa gnyis ni ma yin no/_/mtshungs par ldan pa kun tu 'gro ba ni 'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_sems pa dang reg pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang rnam par shes pa rnams so/_/yang mtshungs par ldan pa kun tu 'gro ba nyon mongs pa can
[\[72a.5\]]ni yid dang [#]/_nyon mongs pa bzhi po rnams so/_/res 'ga' mtshungs par ldan pa [#]ni 'di lta ste/_sems la dad pa la sogs pa dge ba rnams dang /_'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so/_/gnas skabs las gyur pa'i mtshungs par
[\[72a.6\]]ldan pa ni bde ba'i tshor ba mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa'i'o[#]/_/sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i yang de bzhin no/_/rgyun mi 'chad par mtshungs par ldan pa ni lus [#]sems dang bcas pa'i dus na'o/_/rgyun chad pa'i mtshungs par ldan [#]pa ni
[\[72a.7\]]sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas bar du chod pa'i'o[#]/_/phyi rol tu bltas pa'i mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang rab tu [#]ldan pa'i sems dang /_sems las byung ba rnams las phal cher ro/_/nang du bltas pa'i mtshungs par ldan pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa rnams
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams las phal cher ro[#]/_/'dris pa'i mtshungs par ldan pa ni so so'i skye ba [#]rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag las kyang kha cig gi'o/_/ma 'dris pa'i mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'jig rten
[\[72b.2\]]las 'das pa rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi dang po dang de'i 'og ma rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes la [#]thob pa rnams kyi'o/_/mtshungs par ldan pa la mkhas pas phan yon ci zhig 'thob [#]ce na/_sems tsam la tshor ba la sogs pa dang /_
[\[72b.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa [#]shes so/_/de shes na [#]bdag tshor bar byed do[#]/_/'du shes su byed do/_/sems par byed do/_/dran par byed do/_/kun nas nyon mongs so/_/rnam par
[\[72b.4\]]byang ngo zhes mngon par zhen pa spang [#]zhing bdag med pa la 'jug go/_/ldan pa gang zhe na/_mtshan nyid kyis ni snga ma bzhin no/_/rab tu dbye bas [#]ni sa bon dang ldan pa dang /_dbang dang ldan pa dang /_kun tu 'byung ba dang ldan pa'o/_/sa bon dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_
[\[72b.5\]]'dod pa'i khams su skyes par [#]gyur pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang rab tu ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_skye bas 'thob [#]pa'i dge ba
[\[72b.6\]]rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa'o/_/gzugs kyi khams su skyes par 'gyur pa ni/_'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa dang ldan pa [#]ma yin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang
[\[72b.7\]]gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_skye bas 'thob [#]pa'i dge ba rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa'o/_/gzugs med par skyes par gyur pa ni/_'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/gzugs med pa dang rab tu [#]ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_skye bas 'thob [#]pa'i dge ba rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang
[\[73a.2\]]ldan pas ldan pa'o/_/khams gsum pa'i gnyen po thob pa ni/_rnam pa gang dang gang gi [#]gnyen po byung ba de dang de'i sa bon dang [#]ldan pa ma yin gyi/_gang gi gnyen po ma byung ba de'i sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa'o/_/dbang dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_sbyor
[\[73a.3\]]ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i chos 'jig rten pa rnams dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa [#]la sogs pa dang /[ #]lung du ma bstan pa de dag las kyang [#]kha cig ni dbang dang ldan pas ldan
[\[73a.4\]]pa'o/_/kun tu 'byung ba dang ldan pa gang zhe na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams las dge ba'am mi dge ba'am/_lung du [#]bstan pa'am/_lung du ma bstan pa yang rung chos gang dang gang mngon du gyur pa de dang de'i kun tu 'byung ba dang ldan pas ldan pa'o/_/dge
[\[73a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba chad pa ni [#]dge ba'i chos rnams kyi [#]sa bon dang ldan pas ldan pa dang /_ldan pa ma yin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang gtan du ldan pa ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can gyi 'dod chen pa rnams kyi yin par blta ste/_de dag la thar pa'i rgyu med pa'i
[\[73a.6\]]phyir gtan du ste/_rgyu dang mi ldan pa'o/_/ldan pa la mkhas pas phan yon ci zhig 'thob ce na/_chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa shes par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'phel ba dang 'grib pa shes na/_'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/_rgud [#]pa gang la yang gcig tu
[\[73a.7\]]nges par 'du shes par mi 'gyur gyi 'di lta ste/_rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos mngon pa [#]kun las btus pa las/_mtshan nyid kun las btus pa zhes bya ba [#]ste/_kun las btus pa dang po'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_rnam par
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]nges pa gang zhe na/_bden pa rnam par nges pa dang /_chos rnam par nges pa dang /_'thob pa rnam par nges pa dang /_'bel ba'i gtam rnam par nges pa'o/_/bden pa rnam par nges pa [#]gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_
[\[73b.2\]]'gog pa dang /_lam mo/_/sdug bsngal gyi bden pa gang zhe na/_de ni sems can skye ba dang /_skye ba'i gnas kyis kyang rig par bya'o/_/sems can skye ba gang zhe na/_sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams dang /_yi dgas rnams dang /_mi rnams [#]dang /_
[\[73b.3\]]shar gyi lus 'phags dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_'dzam bu gling dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams [#]dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_
[\[73b.4\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun [#]na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can
[\[73b.5\]]dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang [#]/_shin tu mthong [#]dang /[ #]'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rnams su
[\[73b.6\]]sems can skye ba'o[#]/_/skye ba'i gnas gang zhe na/_snod kyi 'jig rten te/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor la ni chu'i dkyil 'khor brten [#]to/_/chu'i dkyil 'khor la ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/sa'i dkyil 'khor la ni ri rab dang gser gyi ri bdun dang /_gling bzhi dang /_bar gyi gling
[\[73b.7\]]brgyad dang /_nang gi rgya mtsho dang /_phyi'i rgya mtsho [#]dang /_ri rab kyi bang rim dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhan rnams dang /_khor [#]yug gi ri dang /_nam mkha' la gzhal med khang rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga'
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas [#]gzhan dag dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa [#]rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang /_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_grang ba'i sems can
[\[74a.2\]]dmyal ba rnams dang /_nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang [#]/_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas de dag [#]kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang /_nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun tu rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed ni [#]stong gi 'jig rten na/_zla ba stong dang /_nyi ma stong dang /_
[\[74a.3\]]ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang /_shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang /_'dzam bu [#]gling stong dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul
[\[74a.4\]]dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig
[\[74a.5\]]rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni khor yug chen pos kun tu bskor to/_/stong gsum gyi stong
[\[74a.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni mnyam du 'jig cing 'chags so/_/'di lta ste dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab [#]na/_bar snang la char gyi rgyun 'bab pa rnams kyi bar dang /_mtshams med pa de bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang 'chags
[\[74a.7\]]pa rnams kyi bar dang /_mtshams med de gzhan dag ni 'jig go/_/gzhan dag ni zhig nas [#]'dug go/_/gzhan dag ni 'chags so/_/gzhan dag ni chags [#]nas 'dug go/_/shar phyogs ji lta bar phyogs bcu thams cad kyang [#]de bzhin no/_/sems can gyi 'jig rten gang
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]yin pa dang /_snod kyi 'jig rten gang yin pa las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byung ba 'di mtha' dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o/_/yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma yin par blta ste/_de
[\[74b.2\]]dag las dang nyon mongs pas bskyed pa ma yin/_las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byung ba ma yin gyi[#]/_/smon lam dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis byung ba dag go/_/de lta bas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod [#]yul yin pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas de dag ni bsam
[\[74b.3\]]gyis mi khyab ste/_de dag ni bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi [#]yul yang ma yin na/_rtog ge pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_yang skye ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/rga ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/na ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/'chi ba ni sdug
[\[74b.4\]]bsngal lo/_/mi sdug pa dang phrad pa ni sdug bsngal lo/_/sdug pa dang bral ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal lo/_/mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal lo/_/ci'i phyir skye ba sdug bsngal zhe na/_dogs [#]pa'i sdug bsngal
[\[74b.5\]]nyid dang /_de las gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir rga ba sdug bsngal zhe na/_na tshod gyur pa sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir na ba sdug bsngal zhe na/_khams gyur pa sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir 'chi ba sdug bsngal zhe na/_
[\[74b.6\]]srog gyur pa sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal zhe na/_phrad pa sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal zhe na/_bral ba sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug
[\[74b.7\]]bsngal zhe na/_re ba 'bras bu med pa sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal zhe na/_gnas ngan len sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de dag ni [#]brgyad yin yang drug tu 'gyur ro/_/drug yin yang brgyad du 'gyur te/_dogs [#]pa'i
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sdug bsngal dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_re ba 'bras bu med pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_gnas ngan len gyi sdug bsngal lo/_/gang sdug bsngal nyid gsum gsungs na/_ci
[\[75a.2\]]sdug bsngal nyid gsum po [#]dag gis sdug bsngal rnam pa brgyad bsdus sam/_sdug bsngal rnam pa brgyad kyis sdug bsngal nyid [#]gsum bsdus she na/_gcig gis gcig bsdus te[#]/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_na ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_
[\[75a.3\]]'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal [#]gang gsungs pa 'dis ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid yongs su bstan to/_/sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal zhes gang gsungs pa
[\[75a.4\]]'dis ni 'gyur ba'i [#]sdug bsngal nyid yongs su bstan to/_/mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal lo zhes gang gsungs pa 'dis ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid [#]yongs su bstan to/_/kun rdzob kyi bden par sdug bsngal ba dang /_don dam pa'i bden par sdug bsngal
[\[75a.5\]]ba zhes gang gsungs pa la kun rdzob kyi bden par sdug bsngal ba ni gang yin/_don dam pa'i bden par sdug bsngal ba ni gang yin [#]zhe na/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa de yang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i bar ni kun rdzob kyi bden par sdug bsngal ba'o/_/mdor na
[\[75a.6\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal lo zhes [#]gsungs pa ni don dam pa'i bden par sdug bsngal ba'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i [#]spyi'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa nyid kyi [#]mtshan nyid dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_bdag
[\[75a.7\]]med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_gang med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_'bral ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_nye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_skad cig gi
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]mtshan nyid dang /_rgyun gyi mtshan nyid dang /_nang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_sems sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'byung [#]ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rgud pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_snod 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/med pa'i mtshan nyid gang
[\[75b.2\]]zhe na/_gang phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched rnams la bdag dang /_bdag gi dus rtag tu med pa'o/_/rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_gang 'du byed skyes pa rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa'o/_/'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_gang 'du byed rnams
[\[75b.3\]]gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur [#]ba'o/_/'bral ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_gang 'du byed rnams la dbang byed pa nyams pa dang /_gzhan dag gis bdag gir byas pa'o/_/nye ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa nyid kyis non pa'o/_/chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_
[\[75b.4\]]mi rtag pa nyid 'byung ba rgyus 'brel pa'o/_/skad cig gi [#]mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'du byed rnams skad cig gcig las phan chad du mi [#]gnas pa'o/_/rgyun gyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/nad la sogs pa'i
[\[75b.5\]]mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_khams dang /_na tshod dang /_srog [#]rnams 'gyur ba'o/_/sems sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'byung [#]ba'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_res 'ga' [#]'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_res 'ga' [#]'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa
[\[75b.6\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bral ba dang /_bsdus pa dang /_g.yengs pa dang /_bying ba dang /_rab tu gzung [#]ba dang /_rgod pa dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_nye bar ma [#]zhi ba dang /_nye bar [#]zhi ba dang /_/mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_mnyam
[\[75b.7\]]par ma bzhag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par sems kyi 'byung ba gang yin pa'o/_/longs spyod 'byor pa rgud pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa nyid do[#]/_/snod 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_'jig par byed pa gsum ste/_me dang /_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]chu dang /_rlung ngo /_/'jig pa na bsdus pa gsum ste/_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni gzhal med khang rnams dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang /_lhan cig 'gags pas 'jig cing 'chags so/_/
[\[76a.2\]]bskal pa bar ma gsum ste/_mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang /_nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang /_mtshon cha'i [#]bskal pa bar ma ste/_de dag gis [#]bskal pa tshar phyin par 'gyur ro/_/mar 'bri ba bar gyi [#]bskal pa gcig dang /_yar 'phel ba dang mar 'bri ba bcwa brgyad dang /_
[\[76a.3\]]yar skye ba gcig ste/_bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig rten 'jig go/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig rten zhig par 'dug go/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig rten 'chags so/_/bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur 'jig rten chags nas 'dug go/_/de dag ni bar gyi
[\[76a.4\]]bskal pa brgyad cu ste/_de ni bskal pa chen po'o/_/bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul des gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i [#]tshad do/_/sems can de dag gi tshe zad cing bsod nams zad la [#]las kyang zad nas/_gnas de
[\[76a.5\]]nas shi 'pho bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pas ji lta bu zhe na/_'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'o/_/bsod nams zad pas ji lta bu zhe na/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba ste/_'di ltar [#]sems can de dag snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang [#]bas bsod nams zad par 'gyur te/_des na dus la
[\[76a.6\]]ma bab kyang 'chi'o/_/las zad pas [#]ji lta bu zhe na/_der skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su gtugs pa'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal nyid gsum dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa brgyad
[\[76a.7\]]ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/ci'i phyir gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal zhes gsungs she na/_mi rtag pa nyid ni gnyis kyi char gtogs pa ste/_skye ba'i char gtogs pa dang /_'jig pa'i char gtogs pa'o/_/skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i mi rtag [#]pa nyid la brten nas sdug bsngal gyi
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sdug bsngal nyid rab tu shes so/_/'jig pa'i char gtogs pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la brten nas 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid rab tu [#]shes so/_/de gnyi ga'i char gtogs pa'i mi rtag pa nyid la brten nas 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid rab tu shes so/_/de la dgongs te bcom
[\[76b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis ngas 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid dang /_'du byed 'gyur ba nyid la dgongs nas/_gang ci tshor yang rung [#]/_'di ni [#]'dir sdug bsngal du gsungs so zhes bka' stsal to/_/yang skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang rjes su 'brel ba'i 'du byed rnams la skye ba la sogs pa
[\[76b.3\]]sdug bsngal brgyad mngon te/_de'i phyir sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_gang la gang med pa de ni des stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di la lhag ma gang yin pa de ni 'dir yod pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[76b.4\]]'di ni stong pa nyid la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i [#]lta ba ste/_phyin ci ma log pa zhes bya'o/_/gang na [#]ci zhig med ce na/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la rtag pa dang brtan pa dang ther zug pa [#]dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang bdag dang bdag gi med do/_/de lta bas na de dag ni des
[\[76b.5\]]stong ngo /_/de la lhag ma yod pa ci zhig ce na/_gang bdag med pa de [#]nyid de/_de ltar bdag ni med kyi bdag med pa ni yod par stong pa nyid khong du chud par bya'o/_/'di las [#]dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa yang yod par/_med pa yang med par yang dag pa ji
[\[76b.6\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang stong pa nyid rnam pa gsum ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis [#]stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin du yod pa ma yin pa'i stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid do/_/dang po ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid nye bar gzung [#]bar blta'o/_/
[\[76b.7\]]gnyis pa ni gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid nye bar gzung ba'o[#]/_/gsum pa ni yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid nye bar gzung [#]bar blta'o/_/bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_ji ltar bdag tu smra ba rnams kyis bdag tu btags [#]pa'i mtshan nyid des/_phung po dang khams dang
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]skye mched rnams mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/_/phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams ni bdag gi mtshan nyid kyis bdag med pa'o/_/'di la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
[\[77a.2\]]dag thams cad ni nga'i ba med do[#]/_/'di ni nga ma yin pa'o/_/'di ni nga'i bdag ma yin pa ste/_de ni 'di [#]bzhin no zhes yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa 'di'i don ci zhe na/_phyi'i dngos po 'di ni bdag gi [#]ma yin no[#]/_/
[\[77a.3\]]nang gi dngos po 'di ni nga ma yin no[#]/_/'di ni nga'i bdag ma yin pa'o [#]zhes bya bar dgongs nas gsungs pa ste/_'di ltar phyi'i dngos po la ni bdag gi rnam pa [#]dang /_nang la ni [#]bdag dang bdag gi [#]rnam par [#]bkag go/_/skad cig gi mtshan nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid do zhes [#]gsungs pa de ji
[\[77a.4\]]lta bu zhe na/_ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba skad cig ma yin pa de ltar gzugs kyang skad cig par [#]blta ste/_sems kyis zin pa dang sems dang grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa dang /_sems 'gyur [#]na de 'gyur ba dang /_sems kyi gnas yin pa dang /_sems kyi dbang
[\[77a.5\]]gis byung ba dang /_sems dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/_/yang mthar 'gyur bar dmigs pa dang /_skyes nas kyang rkyen la mi ltos par rang gi ngang gis rnam par 'jig [#]pa'i phyir gzugs kyang skad cig pa [#]nyid du blta'o/_/gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/_de [#]thams cad 'byung ba
[\[77a.6\]]chen po bzhi dag dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'o/_/zhes gang [#]gsungs pa de ci las dgongs te gsungs she na/_srid pa la dgongs nas gsungs so/_/phyogs gcig la brten pa'i dngos po'i don ni rgyur byas pa'i don te/_'dus pa gang las 'byung ba gang dmigs
[\[77a.7\]]pa de ni de na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'byung ba gcig las gyur pa'i 'dus pa yang yod/_'byung ba gnyis las gyur pa [#]yod pa nas/[# ]'byung ba thams cad las gyur pa yang [#]yod do/_/rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la yang rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gang 'dus pa gang la [#]dmigs pa de ni
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]de na yod pa'o zhes rig par bya'o/_/rdul phra rab bsags pa ni gzugs 'dus pa'o zhes gang brjod pa de la rdul phra rab lus med par rig par bya'o/_/blos mthar rab tu phye nas rdul phra rab tu rnam par gzhag [#]ste/_ril po'i 'du shes rnam par gzhig pa dang /_gzugs la
[\[77b.2\]]rdzas su [#]yongs su grub pa med [#]par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/yang sdug bsngal 'di ni shin tu rgyas la ma bsrabs pa dang /_bsrabs [#]pa dang /_bsrabs [#]pa yang ma [#]yin la ma bsrabs pa'ang [#]yin pa yang yod/_bar ma ma bsrabs pa yang yod/_bsrabs [#]lam bsrabs pa yang yod/_
[\[77b.3\]]ches bsrabs [#]la bsrabs pa yang yod/_shin tu ches [#]bsrabs la bsrabs [#]pa yang yod/_sdug bsngal ma yin [#]la sdug bsngal du snang zhing bsrabs pa chen por [#]nye bar gnas pa yang yod do/_/sdug bsngal shin tu rgyas la ma bsrabs [#]pa gang zhe na/_gang 'dod pa na spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
[\[77b.4\]]bsags [#]pa rnams kyi'o/_/bsrabs pa gang zhe na/_de nyid thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa skyes pa rnams kyi'o/_/bsrabs pa yang yin la ma bsrabs pa yang yin pa gang zhe na/_de nyid 'jig rten pas 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid du bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags [#]pa rnams kyi'o/_/
[\[77b.5\]]bar ma ma bsrabs pa gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi khams su skyes [#]pa thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnam par spangs pa [#]rnams kyi'o/_/bsrabs [#]la ma bsrabs pa gang zhe na/_gzugs med par skyes par [#]thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams par spangs pa rnams kyi'o/_/ches bsrabs [#]la bsrabs pa gang
[\[77b.6\]]zhe na/_gang slob pa rnams kyi'o/_/shin tu ches bsrabs la bsrabs [#]pa gang zhe na/_gang mi slob pa rnams kyi srog gi dbang po'i rkyen gyi [#]ming dang gzugs so/_/sdug bsngal ma yin la sdug bsngal du snang zhing bsrabs pa chen por nye bar gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems
[\[77b.7\]]dpa' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa rnams kyi ste/_bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba'i phyir ro/_/'chi ba [#]sdug bsngal lo zhes gang gsungs pa de la 'chi ba rnam pa gsum ste/_dge ba'i sems yod pa dang /_mi dge ba'i sems yod pa dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i sems yod pa
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]ste/[ #]rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed [#]pas sam/_gzhan gyis bsgrubs pas kyang rung ste/_sems kyi rgyu ba [#]gsal ba ni dge ba'i sems yod pa'i 'chi bar blta'o/_/rang gi mi dge ba'i sems bskyed [#]pas sam/_gzhan gyis bsgrubs pas kyang rung ste/_
[\[78a.2\]]sems [#]rgyu ba gsal ba ni mi dge ba'i sems yod pa'i 'chi bar blta'o/_/sems kyi rgyu ba gsal yang rung mi gsal yang rung rkyen de [#]gnyi ga ma tshang ba'i phyir mngon par 'du byed mi nus pa yang rung ste/_lung du ma bstan pa'i sems yod pa'i 'chi bar blta'o/_/dge ba byed
[\[78a.3\]]pa'i lus ni thog ma nyid smad grang bar 'gyur[#]/_mi dge ba byed pa'i lus ni [#]stod grang bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dge ba byed pa'i bar ma do'i srid pa mngon par 'grub [#]pa ni/_dper na phyar ba nag po'am[#]/_mtshan mo mun pa [#]mun nag tu snang ba lta bu'o/_/dge ba byed pa ni dper na
[\[78a.4\]]snam bu dkar po'am/_zla ba'i 'od dang bcas pa'i mtshan mor [#]snang ba lta bu'o/_/bar ma do'i srid pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su skye ba na'o/_/gzugs med pa [#]nas ni [#]'chi 'pho [#]ba na'o/_/de ni yid las byung ba dang dri za zhes kyang bya'o/_/de ltar thogs na [#]
[\[78a.5\]]zhag bdun gnas te/_de tshun chad kyis 'chi 'pho'o[#]/_/ji [#]ste na ldog go/_/de na gnas pa yang las sog go[#]/_/skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can rnams kyang mthong ngo /_/gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i byad gzugs so/_/'gro ba la thags [#]thogs med do/_/rdzu 'phrul
[\[78a.6\]]dang ldan pa bzhin du [#]myur du 'gro zhing skye ba'i gnas su thogs so/_/srang mda'i mthon dman gyi tshul du 'chi 'pho zhing nying mtshams sbyor ro/_/bar ma do'i srid pa na [#]gnas pa ni [#]skye ba'i gnas la 'dod chags bskyed [#]de/_/de las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa ni rkyen du 'gyur ro/_/'dod
[\[78a.7\]]chags dang bcas par bar ma do'i srid pa 'gag cing nur nur po rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa 'byung ste/_de ni rnam par smin pa'o/_/de'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin[#]/_skye gnas bzhi po sgo nga las skye ba dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod gsher las
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]skye ba dang /_brdzus te skye bar dbang po mngon par 'grub po/_/kun 'byung ba'i [#]bden pa gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis byung [#]ba'i las so/_/gtso bor bstan pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sred pa yang 'byung ba can dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan
[\[78b.2\]]pa de dang der mngon par dga' ba la kun 'byung ba'i [#]bden par bstan pas bstan to/_/gtso bo'i don gang zhe na/_gang thams cad du 'gro ba'i don to/_/thams cad du 'gro ba'i don gang zhe na/_'di ltar sred pa dngos po thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_gnas skabs thams
[\[78b.3\]]cad du 'gro ba dang /_dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_khams thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_tshol ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/_grangs dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_'byung ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_mtshungs
[\[78b.4\]]par ldan pa dang /_rnam [#]grangs dang /_log [#]par zhugs pa dang /_khams dang /_ris dang /_spong bas kyang nyon mongs par blta'o/_/grangs gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa drug gam bcu'o/_/nyon mongs pa drug gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_khong khro ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_
[\[78b.5\]]ma rig [#]pa dang /_the tshom dang /_lta ba'o/_/de dag nyid lta ba rnam pa lnga'i bye brag gis bcur 'gyur ro/_/mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_chos gang 'byung ba na rab tu ma zhi ba'i mtshan nyid du 'byung ste/_de byung [#]bas sems kyi rgyud rab tu ma zhi bar 'byung ba de nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/
[\[78b.6\]]'byung ba gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ma spangs par gyur pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gnas kyi chos kyang snang bar [#]gyur pa dang /_de la yang tshul bzhin ma yin pa [#]yid la byed pa nye bar gnas pa yin te/_de lta bu las nyon mongs pa [#]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dmigs pa gang
[\[78b.7\]]zhe na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dmigs par blta'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i gzhi yang dmigs pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang /_lta ba dang /_the tshom ma gtogs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa ni sa gong ma la mi dmigs so/_/sa gong ma pa'i [#]nyon
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mongs pa ni sa 'og ma la dmigs pa ma yin no/_/'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni de dag la dmigs pa ma yin par blta ste[#]/_de'i dmigs pa ni des yongs su rtog pa'o/_/gzhi med pa la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa ni
[\[79a.2\]]lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o[#]/_/de las gzhan pa ni gzhi dang bcas pa la dmigs pa'o/_/mtshungs par ldan pa gang zhe na/_'dod chags ni khong khro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/khong khro ba dang ji lta bar the tshom dang yang de bzhin no/_/lhag ma ni de dang
[\[79a.3\]]mtshungs par ldan no/_/'dod chags dang [#]khong khro ba [#]ji lta ba de bzhin du khong khro ba yang 'dod chags dang nga rgyal dang lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/nga rgyal ni khong khro ba [#]dang the tshom dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/ma rig pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang
[\[79a.4\]]mtshungs par ldan pa dang ma 'dres pa yang yin no/_/ma 'dres pa ni bden pa rnams mi shes pa'o/_/lta ba ni khong khro ba dang the tshom dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/the tshom ni 'dod chags dang nga rgyal dang lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/khro ba la sogs pa [#]
[\[79a.5\]]nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni phan tshun mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa ni mi dge ba thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan no/_/rmugs pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_le lo dang /_bag med pa ni nyon mongs pa can [#]thams cad dang mtshungs par
[\[79a.6\]]ldan no/_/rnam grangs gang zhe na/_kun tu sbyor ba dang /_'ching ba dang /_bag la nyal [#]dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas dkris [#]pa dang /_chu bo dang /_sbyor ba dang /_nye bar len pa dang /_mdud pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_tha ba dang /_dri ma dang /_sdig pa dang /_zug
[\[79a.7\]]rngu dang /_ci yang dang /_nyes par spyod [#]pa dang /_zag pa dang /_phongs [#]pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rims nad dang /_nags sbyor dang /_gags zhes bya ba dag go/_/kun tu sbyor ba rnams ni du zhig/_ji ltar gang du [#]sbyor zhe na/_kun tu sbyor
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ba dgu ste/_rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor [#]ba dang /_khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ma rig [#]pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang /_the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang /_phrag dog gi
[\[79b.2\]]kun tu sbyor ba dang /_ser sna'i kun tu sbyor [#]ba'o/_/rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags so/_/rjes su chags pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni khams gsum pa [#]la yid 'byung [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yid mi 'byung bas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi
[\[79b.3\]]spyod do[#]/_/des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang kun tu sbyor ro/_/khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba ni sems can dang sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi [#]gnas kyi chos rnams la sems kyi [#]kun nas mnar sems pa'o/_/khong khro ba'i kun tu sbyor ba
[\[79b.4\]]dang ldan pa ni khong khro ba'i rgyu las sems yal bar mi 'dor te/_des na [#]mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod do/_/des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/nga rgyal gyi [#]kun tu sbyor ba ni nga rgyal bdun te/_nga rgyal dang /_che ba'i nga rgyal dang /_
[\[79b.5\]]nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_mngon pa'i [#]nga rgyal dang /_cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal lo/_/nga rgyal gang zhe na/_chung ngu [#]bas bdag che ba'am/_mtshungs [#]pa dang mtshungs so snyam du [#]sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/che
[\[79b.6\]]ba'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/_mtshungs pa bas bdag [#]che ba'am/_che ba dang mtshungs so snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gang zhe na/_che ba [#]bas kyang bdag ches [#]che'o snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/_nye bar
[\[79b.7\]]len pa'i phung po lnga po [#]rnams la bdag gam bdag gir yang dag par rjes su lta ba'i sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/_gong ma'i khyad par [#]thob par bya ba ma thob par bdag gis thob po snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]gang zhe na/_ches 'phags pa bas bdag cung zad gcig [#]gis chung ngo snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/log pa'i nga rgyal gang zhe na/_yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan pa la/_bdag yon tan dang ldan no snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o/_/nga rgyal gyi
[\[80a.2\]]kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su mi shes so/_/yongs su ma shes na ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen nas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod de/_des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/
[\[80a.3\]]ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ni khams gsum pa'i mi shes pa'o/_/ma rig pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal gyi [#]chos rnams dang kun [#]'byung ba'i chos rnams la [#]lhag par chags so/_/de dag la lhag par chags pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod do/_des phyi ma la sdug
[\[80a.4\]]bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba ni lta ba gsum ste/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang /_log par lta ba'o[#]/_/lta ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni log pas [#]nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol lo/_/mngon
[\[80a.5\]]par zhen to/_/log pas nges [#]par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod de/_des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor [#]ro/_/mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_
[\[80a.6\]]brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/_/mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni log pas nges par 'byung ba'i thabs [#]la mngon par zhen pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod do/_des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/the tshom gyi kun
[\[80a.7\]]tu sbyor ba ni bden pa rnams la yid gnyis za ba'o[#]/_/the tshom gyi kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la som nyi za zhing /_chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la som nyi za ba'o/_/dkon mchog rnams la som nyi za bas legs par bsgrub [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dkon mchog rnams la legs par mi bsgrub [#]pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod de/_des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par chags pas pha rol gyi phun sum tshogs pa la
[\[80b.2\]]mi bzod par byas pa'i sems khong nas 'khrug [#]pa'o/_/phrag dog gi kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti gces su 'dzin pa yin gyi chos gces su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/rnyed pa dang bkur sti gces su 'dzin pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod de/_des phyi ma la
[\[80b.3\]]sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed [#]pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par chags pa nyid yod byad rnams la sems kun tu 'dzin pa'o/_/ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni sogs pa gces su 'dzin pa yin gyi yo byad
[\[80b.4\]]bsnyungs pa gces su 'dzin pa ma yin te/_sogs pa gces su 'dzin [#]pas mi dge ba spyod cing dge ba mi spyod de/_des phyi ma la sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub par byed pas sdug bsngal dang sbyor ro/_/'ching ba ni gsum ste/_'dod chags kyi 'ching ba dang /_zhe sdang gi 'ching ba
[\[80b.5\]]dang /_gti mug gi 'ching ba'o/_/'dod chags kyi 'ching bas ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid la 'ching bar [#]'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang gi 'ching bas ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid la 'ching bar 'gyur ro/_/gti mug gi 'ching bas ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid la 'ching bar
[\[80b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug la brten nas/_dge ba la sbyor ba na 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa mi 'thob ste/_de'i phyir yang de dag ni 'ching ba rnams so/_/bag la nyal [#]ni bdun te/_'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /_khong khro ba'i bag la nyal
[\[80b.7\]]dang /_srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /_nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal dang /_ma rig pa'i bag la nyal dang /_lta ba'i bag la nyal dang /_the tshom gyi bag la nyal lo/_/'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]len to/_/khong khro ba'i bag la nyal ni khong khro ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len to/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len to/_/nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ni nga
[\[81a.2\]]rgyal gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len to/_/ma rig pa'i bag la nyal ni ma rig pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len to/_/lta ba'i bag la nyal ni lta ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas ngan len to/_/the tshom gyi bag la nyal ni the tshom gyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas
[\[81a.3\]]ngan len to/_/'dod pa tshol ba ma spangs pas ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal dang /_khong khro ba'i bag la nyal rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/srid pa tshol ba ma spangs pas ni srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/log pas tshangs par spyod pa tshol
[\[81a.4\]]bam spangs pas ni nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal dang /_ma rig pa'i bag la nyal dang /_lta ba'i bag la nyal dang /_the tshom gyi bag la nyal rgyas par 'gyur te/_'di ltar de dag ni gnyen po chung ngu tsam gyis kyang khengs par 'gyur ro/_/bden pa rnams la rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/log
[\[81a.5\]]pas thar pa dang thar pa'i thabs la rtog par byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la som nyi za'o/_/the tshom za'o/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa gang dag yin pa de dag nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yin no/_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa [#]
[\[81a.6\]]yin la nyon mongs pa ma yin pa yang yod de/_nyon mongs pa rnams ma gtogs par de las gzhan pa sems las byung ba'i 'du byed kyi phung po nyon mongs pa can no/_/yang 'dod chags ni sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o/_/zhe sdang dang gti mug ni sems las byung ba'i nye
[\[81a.7\]]ba'i [#]nyon mongs pa ste/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa des sems nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du gyur na/_chags pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/_grol bar mi 'gyur te/_sgrib pa de ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du/_sems 'di yun ring po nas 'dod chags kyis kun
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa/_zhe sdang dang gti mug gis [#]kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/kun nas dkris pa ni brgyad de rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel
[\[81b.2\]]med pa'o/_/zhi gnas kyi dus dang /_rab tu 'dzin pa'i dus dang /_btang snyoms kyi dus dang /[ #]de dag gi gzhi dang po rnam [#]par dag pa'i dus na/_yang dang yang shas cher [#]sems la kun nas 'khri bar [#]byed pas kun nas dkris pa dag go/_/chu bo ni bzhi ste 'dod pa'i chu bo dang /_srid
[\[81b.3\]]pa'i chu bo dang /_lta ba'i chu bo dang /_ma rig pa'i chu bo'o/_/rgyun phyogs su khyer [#]bar byed pa'i phyir chu bo dag go/_/'dod pa tshol ba la zhugs pa'i ni dang po'o/_/srid pa tshol ba la zhugs pa'i ni gnyis pa'o/_/log pas tshangs par spyod pa tshol ba la zhugs pa'i ni tha ma gnyis te/_
[\[81b.4\]]gnas pa dang gnas 'brel pa'i tshul gyis so/_/sbyor ba ni bzhi ste/_'dod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_srid pa'i sbyor ba dang /_lta ba'i sbyor ba dang /_ma rig pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/'bral ba'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir sbyor ba rnams te/_de dag kyang tshol ba la zhugs pa gsum po rnams kyi yin te/_
[\[81b.5\]]ji ltar [#]mthun mthun du sbyar ro/_/nye bar len pa ni bzhi ste/_'dod pa'i [#]nye bar len pa dang /_lta ba'i [#]nye bar len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi [#]nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa'o/_/rtsod pa'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i phyir te/_de'i phyir yang srid pa nye
[\[81b.6\]]bar len pa'i phyir nye bar len pa rnams so/_/'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_ltag par zhen pa dang /_rnam par bcings pa dang /_yongs su zhen pa dang /_kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus khyim pa rnams dang /_khyim pa rnams su rtsod do[#]/_/rtsod pa de'i rtsa ba ni dang po yin no/_/lta ba la
[\[81b.7\]]'dod chags dang /_lhag par zhen pa dang /_rnam par bcings pa dang /_yongs su zhen pa dang /_kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod de/_rtsod pa de'i [#]rtsa ba ni nye bar len pa gsum po dag ste/_lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis ni lta ba'i nye bar
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]len pa'o/_/phal cher brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub drag po so so [#]tha dad pa dag ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi nye bar len pa'o/_/de dag gi gnas 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pa'o/_/lta ba'i nye bar len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang
[\[82a.2\]]brtul zhugs kyi nye bar len pas ni mu stegs can nang phan tshun rtsod do/_/bdag tu smra ba'i nye bar len pas ni mu stegs can rnams dang chos 'di pa rnams su rtsod do/_/de ltar de dag rtsod pa'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pas phyi ma la yang srid pa nye bar len to[#]/_/des na nye bar len
[\[82a.3\]]pa rnams zhes bya'o/_/mdud pa ni bzhi ste/_brnab sems lus kyi mdud pa dang /_gnod [#]sems lus kyi mdud pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa lus kyi mdud pa dang /_'di bden no zhes mchog tu 'dzin cing [#]mngon par zhen pa lus kyi mdud pa'o/_/mnyam
[\[82a.4\]]par gzhag pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir mdud pa rnams te/_'di ltar g.yeng ba'i rgyu ni bzhi ste/_zang zing cung zad tsam gyi rgyus sems g.yeng ba dang /_rtsod pa la legs par mi bsgrub [#]pa'i rgyu dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs drag pos sdug bsngal bar
[\[82a.5\]]gnas pa'i rgyu dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pas shes bya la rtog pa'i rgyus [#]sems g.yeng bar byed do/_/sgrib pa ni lnga ste/_'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang /_rgod pa dang /_'gyod pa dang /_the tshom gyi sgrib pa ste/_rab tu byung [#]ba
